dates.monthNames: January, February, March, April, May, June, July, August, September, October, November, December
dates.monthNamesShort: Jan., Feb., Mar., Apr., May., Jun., Jul., Aug., Sep., Oct., Nov., Dec.
dates.dayNames: Sunday, Monday, Tuesday, Wednesday, Thursday, Friday, Saturday
dates.dayNamesShort: Sun. , Mon., Tue., Wed., Thu., Fri., Sat.

CommonMessages.unknown: Unknown error. Please contact the administrator
CommonMessages.loggedIn: You have been successfully logged in.
CommonMessages.incorrectRevisionError: Cannot update the record because the version is not the latest.

UserMessages.siteIdentificationChanged: Site identification image has been changed

validation.noScript: Please upload existing script or create a new one

LoginDialog.sessionEnded: Sorry, your session has ended. To perform your requested action, please Log in again in a new window. After successful login, return to this window, close this dialog, and then attempt to perform your action again.

LoginTemplate.siteIdentificationExplanation:
Please enter your login name.
Your site image and pass phrase will be displayed here.

404.requestedPageCouldNotBeFound: The requested page could not be found.

ChangeSecurityDataDialogTemplate.enterNewPasswordToChange: Please enter a new password in the fields below to change your password.
ChangeSecurityDataDialogTemplate.selectQuestionAndAnserIfYouWant: Optionally, select a question and enter your answer.
ChangeSecurityDataDialogTemplate.securityQuestionAndAnserExplanation: The Security Question selected and the corresponding Answer you provided is used to help identify you in the event that you forget your password.

ChangeSiteIdentificationDialogTemplate.siteImageAndPhaseExplanation: The Site Image and Phrase selected will be shown to you upon login to confirm that you are logging in to the genuine site

ForgottenPasswordTemplate.enterLogin: Please enter your login in the field below to continue.
